record.dc:title: 259GP22, 15GP22, Greenup County, Kentucky. Hardin Village. Area "C" from North.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Fort Ancient Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: Photograph of Area "C" showing House "N" completely exposed, House "M 2" completely exposed, and House "M L" partially exposed. Charred roof beams left in situ. Compare with Photo 258Gp22. Taken from East.
record.wpa:comments: For Feature 66, floor remnants of House "M", see Photo 238GP22; for House "M" see also 252, 257, 258, 259GP22. More information on Feature, including diagram, available at institution.
record.wpa:photograph_category: Structure Patterns; General Site and Excavation
